questions.question: What is AI feedback?
questions.answer: AI feedback includes writing corrections, comprehension quiz grading, and sentence generation for flashcards. Each time you get feedback on your writing or generate new example sentences, it uses one AI credit.

questions.question: Are the premade vocabulary decks free?
questions.answer: Yes! All premade vocabulary decks (JLPT N5-N1, etc.) are free to use with basic flashcard reviews. Premium features like AI sentence generation and writing feedback require a paid plan.

questions.question: Can I change plans anytime?
questions.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any differences.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and Apple Pay through our secure payment processor, Stripe.
